data.name: 我是两个人 Demo
data.detailed_description:
About Us

该版本仅供试玩，不代表最终效果。包含第一章，游玩约50分钟。欢迎您的建议。
Bilibili：无名小厂
微博：无名小厂游戏
贴吧：无名小厂游戏


About the Game

A strange and interesting visual novel, about 2 hours long.

Strange Story
You have two bodies: niutianci is very self disciplined and good at learning; Murong egg likes freedom.
From small to large, two bodies mean you can do double things and help each other.
When entering the same class, no one knew that Xueba and gangster were the same person. When niutianci was studying, Murong egg needed to help him deal with trivial matters; Murong egg is in trouble and needs to be solved by niutianci.
However, the original harmony was broken, the cracks gradually appeared, and the two bodies broke out in physical conflict...

Narrative Style
The story is set in a small Chinese town more than ten years ago. The absurd theme, black humor and concise and lively narration have created a meaningful high school life.
You need to control your two bodies to do things and talk, and your inner monologue will pop up on the screen at the right time.
People's hearts are so complicated and mysterious that teenagers are also growing and changing. The whole story is full of conflicts.
Self discipline or freedom? How to find your true self?

The Role of Setting
Wonderful stories are matched with individual characters. Each character has a distinct personality and rich language performance.

Small Game
Important plots will be presented in the form of small games. The process includes about 10 different games. For example:
*When you want to play truant and go to Internet cafes, you need to pass a horizontal version of the adventure game,
*When you are chased by your head teacher in the corridor, you will be converted to Parkour game,
*When you throw chalk at your classmates in the classroom, you will enter the shooting game

Voice
All the lines of tens of thousands of words are voiced and recorded by the latest AI. To provide a better sense of immersion.
The voices of the characters have been carefully selected: some are formal, some are cynical, and some are cute.

* This game needs to read a lot of text, not the battle system.
* This game contains swear words, underage rebellion, mental illness and more.

data.short_description: "When the self disciplined me meets the free me."—— A strange and interesting narrative game. I have two bodies and live two kinds of life: self disciplined I am responsible for learning and free I am responsible for entertainment. The two of me in high school were assigned to the same class...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
